---
title: "Plots"
output: html_document
---

Here's tiydverse

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

here's the dataframe 
```{r}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(200, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1+2*x + rnorm(100)
  )
```

```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x =x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
